articles.description: A recent Rangers matchwinner has scurried to justify the comments of an under-fire Celtic chief who made a bold claim about the Covid-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
Rangers matchwinner in the recent 1-0 win over Celtic has tried to give an explanation over the controversial Covid-19 comments of Parkhead chief executive Peter Lawwell.
